title: Rejuvenate Inc. - Chiropractor in Centennial, CO US
description: Rejuvenate Inc. is your local Chiropractor in Centennial serving all of your needs. Call us today at (303) 850-0880 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Welcome to Rejuvenate Wellness Center, where you will find holistic healthcare for life. Unlike typical healthcare experiences, which tend to mask or completely ignore symptoms of ill health, practitioner Dr. Peter M. Petropulos examines the root causes of disease. Healing can only be achieved by healing your gut. Once that is accomplished, it will lead to healing of the mind and ultimately, the soul. Our focus is based on the total-body concept, which includes addressing nutritional, structural, and emotional facets of the human condition. Consequently, lifestyle changes, nutritional counseling, chiropractic care, acupuncture, and the latest in biotechnology are utilized to treat a wide variety of clinical conditions. At Rejuvenate Wellness Center, causes of illness are revealed, allowing for a treatment protocol that is truly personalized and efficacious, which eliminates useless "band-aid" treatments for symptoms. We provide the expertise, support, and encouragement you need to lead a healthy lifestyle. We sincerely look forward to helping you regain and maintain optimal health now and in the future. 6940 South Holly Circle Suite 201 Centennial, CO
